documents.document: “He’s (Sen. McCain) not a war hero. He was a war hero because he was captured. I like people who weren’t captured.” #tcot
'Women: “You have to treat ’em like shit.”' #nevertrump
“I will build a great, great wall on our southern border and I will make Mexico pay for that wall.“ #nevertrump
“Sometimes, part of making a deal is denigrating your competition.” #nevertrump
“Half of my friends are under indictment right now because they sent emails to each other about how they’re screwing people.” #nevertrump
“How stupid are the people of Iowa?” #NeverTrump #TCOT
"How amazing State Health Director who verified copies of Obamas birth certificate died in plane crash today All others lived" #nevertrump

"@michellemalkin You were born stupid!" #NeverTrump #ShesAlsoAwful
“Look at that face! Would anyone vote for that? Can you imagine that, the face of our next president?" about Carly Fiorina #nevertrump

“If Hillary Clinton can’t satisfy her husband what makes her think she can satisfy America?” #nevertrump
